brief: Therese Johaug returns for Olympic gold in Women's 10km Classic today at Milano-Cortina.
Granerud and Lindvik jump for Norwegian medals in Normal Hill Individual this evening.
Liverpool chase Arsenal at Sunderland; Hovland tees off at Pebble Beach tomorrow.

radar: Jarl Magnus Riiber faces Individual Gundersen on Friday in Nordic Combined, while Klaebo goes again in Men's Sprint Free. The big distance showdowns arrive Sunday-Tuesday: the 50km classic marathon, Large Hill ski jumping final, Men's Relay biathlon, and Men's Slalom with both Kristoffersen and Braathen medal hunting.
Premier League title race heats up with Liverpool at Sunderland tonight ‚Äî Arsenal lead by six points. Hovland starts his Pebble Beach campaign Thursday, seeking form ahead of the majors.
